title: Supreme Celestial Devil - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Cultivation   Doctors   Family Conflict   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Schemes And Conspiracies   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: Ninth Kingpin
description:
In his past life, Li Fang was a talented cardiologist. However, after a botched surgery that resulted in the death of his patient, he was stabbed and his soul transmigrated to another world.
Now in the possession of the body of Ning Xiaochuan, a man incapable of learning martial arts due to heart disease, Li Fang cures the disease and makes an astonishing discovery about his heart. This discovery will ultimately bring about the hidden potential Ning Xiaochuan was capable of.
Join our hero as he works to survive in the new and deadly world.>
